summary: The site has a couple of critical issues that need attention, including a missing sitemap and an HTTP error on the homepage. Addressing these will improve site visibility and user experience.

top_issues.why_it_matters: A sitemap helps search engines index the site effectively.
HTTP errors can prevent users from accessing the site and negatively impact SEO.

recommended_actions.action: Fix the HTTP error on the homepage

quick_wins: Check server settings to resolve HTTP errors
Ensure the sitemap URL is correctly configured
Add a robots.txt file if missing
